database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: Matching Cross-linked Peptide Spectra: Only as Good as the Worse Identification
entry.description: This is the data associated with the publication: Trnka MJ, Baker PR, Robinson PJ, Burlingame AL, Chalkley RJ. Mol Cell Proteomics. 2014 13(2) 420-34 It consists of three datasets of chemically cross-linked samples. Please read the publication for more details.
